content:
MembershipPasswordAttribute Class

In this Article

Validates whether a password field meets the current password requirements for the membership provider.

Syntax

Declaration

[System.AttributeUsage(System.AttributeTargets.Property | System.AttributeTargets.Field | System.AttributeTargets.Parameter, AllowMultiple=false)]
public class MembershipPasswordAttribute : System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.ValidationAttribute

Inheritance Hierarchy

  • Object
  • Attribute
  • System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.ValidationAttribute
  • MembershipPasswordAttribute

MembershipPasswordAttribute()

Initializes a new instance of the MembershipPasswordAttribute class.

Properties summary

MinNonAlphanumericCharactersError

Gets or sets the MinNonAlphanumericCharactersError attribute.
MinPasswordLengthError

Gets or sets the MinPasswordLengthError attribute.
MinRequiredNonAlphanumericCharacters

Gets or sets the minimum required non-alpha numeric characters the attribute uses for validation.
MinRequiredPasswordLength

Gets or sets the minimum required password length this attribute uses for validation.
PasswordStrengthError

Gets or sets the PasswordStrengthError attribute.
PasswordStrengthRegexTimeout

Gets or sets a value that specifies how long the regular expression can occur before the operation times out.
PasswordStrengthRegularExpression

Gets or sets the regular expression string representing the password strength the attribute uses for validation.
ResourceType

Gets or sets the Type that contains the resources for the stem.Web.Security.MembershipPasswordAttribute.MinPasswordLengthError* property, the stem.Web.Security.MembershipPasswordAttribute.MinNonAlphanumericCharactersError* property, and the stem.Web.Security.MembershipPasswordAttribute.PasswordStrengthError* property.

Methods summary

FormatErrorMessage(String)

Applies formatting to an error message based on the provided name of the data field where the error occurred.
IsValid(Object,ValidationContext)

Validates the specified value with respect to the current validation attribute.

Constructors

  • MembershipPasswordAttribute()

    Initializes a new instance of the MembershipPasswordAttribute class.

    public MembershipPasswordAttribute ();

Properties

  • MinNonAlphanumericCharactersError

    Gets or sets the MinNonAlphanumericCharactersError attribute.

    public string MinNonAlphanumericCharactersError { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      The MinNonAlphanumericCharactersError attribute.

    Remarks

    The MinNonAlphanumericCharactersError property contains either the literal, non-localized string or the resource key that you can use with the ResourceType property to configure the localized error message. The error message is displayed when the provided password contains fewer non-alphanumeric characters than specified by the MinRequiredNonAlphanumericCharacters property.

  • MinPasswordLengthError

    Gets or sets the MinPasswordLengthError attribute.

    public string MinPasswordLengthError { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      The MinPasswordLengthError attribute.

    Remarks

    The MinPasswordLengthError property contains either a literal, non-localized string or a resource key that you can use with the ResourceType property to configure the localized error message. The error message is displayed when the provided password is shorter than the MinRequiredPasswordLength property.

  • MinRequiredNonAlphanumericCharacters

    Gets or sets the minimum required non-alpha numeric characters the attribute uses for validation.

    public int MinRequiredNonAlphanumericCharacters { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Int32

      The minimum required non-alpha numeric characters the attribute uses for validation.

    Remarks

    If the MinRequiredNonAlphanumericCharacters property is not explicitly set, it uses the value of the MinRequiredNonAlphanumericCharacters property.

  • MinRequiredPasswordLength

    Gets or sets the minimum required password length this attribute uses for validation.

    public int MinRequiredPasswordLength { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Int32

      The minimum required password length this attribute uses for validation.

    Remarks

    If the MinRequiredPasswordLength property is not explicitly set, it uses the value of the MinRequiredPasswordLength property.

  • PasswordStrengthError

    Gets or sets the PasswordStrengthError attribute.

    public string PasswordStrengthError { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      The PasswordStrengthError attribute.

    Remarks

    The PasswordStrengthError property contains either the literal, non-localized string or the resource key that you can use with a ResourceType property to configure the localized error message. The error message is displayed when the provided password is shorter than the MinRequiredPasswordLength property.

  • PasswordStrengthRegexTimeout

    Gets or sets a value that specifies how long the regular expression can occur before the operation times out.

    public Nullable<int> PasswordStrengthRegexTimeout { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Nullable<Int32>

      A value that specifies how long the regular expression can occur before the operation times out.

  • PasswordStrengthRegularExpression

    Gets or sets the regular expression string representing the password strength the attribute uses for validation.

    public string PasswordStrengthRegularExpression { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      The regular expression string representing the password strength the attribute uses for validation.

    Remarks

    If the PasswordStrengthRegularExpression property is not explicitly set, it uses the value of the PasswordStrengthRegularExpression property.

  • ResourceType

    Gets or sets the Type that contains the resources for the stem.Web.Security.MembershipPasswordAttribute.MinPasswordLengthError* property, the stem.Web.Security.MembershipPasswordAttribute.MinNonAlphanumericCharactersError* property, and the stem.Web.Security.MembershipPasswordAttribute.PasswordStrengthError* property.

    public Type ResourceType { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Type

      To be added.
